author: Special Correspondent
text:
Srikanth Sivaraman, Director, Snam Alloys Pvt. Ltd, has been elected chairman of the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) Puducherry for 2016-17. This follows the CII Puducherry State Council annual meeting on Thursday which elected a new set of office bearers.

Mr. Sivaraman was the Vice Chairman CII Puducherry for the year 2015-16.

Shrikanth R. D., Director - Manufacturing, Lenovo India Pvt. Ltd., Puducherry was elected the vice chairman of CII-Puducherry.

Mr.Shrikanth was the convenor, manufacturing panel for the year 2014-15.
title: CII Puducherry gets new chairman
